SKJAALD.title: Skjaald Game System
SKJAALD.AbilityUseHint: Configure how you would like to use the {name} {type}.
SKJAALD.AbilityUseUnavailableHint: There are no uses of this item remaining!
SKJAALD.AbilityUseChargedHint: This {type} is charged and ready to use!
SKJAALD.AbilityUseRechargeHint: This {type} is depleted and must be recharged!
SKJAALD.AbilityUseNormalHint: This {type} has {value} of {max} uses per {per} remaining.
SKJAALD.AbilityUseConsumableChargeHint: Using this {type} will consume 1 charge of {value} remaining.
SKJAALD.AbilityUseConsumableQuantityHint: Using this {type} will consume 1 quantity of {quantity} remaining
SKJAALD.AbilityUseConsumableDestroyHint: Using this {type} will consume its final charge and it will be destroyed.
SKJAALD.ActionWarningNoItem: The requested item {item} no longer exists on Actor {name}
SKJAALD.ActionWarningNoToken: You must have one or more controlled Tokens in order to use this option.
SKJAALD.ActorWarningInvalidItem: {itemType} items cannot be added to a {actorType}.
SKJAALD.AddEmbeddedItemPromptHint: Do you want to add these items to your character sheet?
SKJAALD.ArmorConfigHint: Fill in the above box to override automatically calculated armor class.
SKJAALD.BonusesHint: Define global bonuses as formulas which are added to certain rolls. For example: 1d4 + 2
SKJAALD.BonusesInstructions: Configure character bonuses which are added to the appropriate dice roll
SKJAALD.ClassMakeOriginalHint: First class taken by character used to determine certain class traits when multiclassing.
SKJAALD.ConsumeWarningNoResource: {name} is designated to consume {type} but no resource is specified!
SKJAALD.ConsumeWarningNoSource: The designated {type} source that {name} consumes no longer exists!
SKJAALD.ConsumeWarningNoQuantity: {name} has run out of its designated {type}!
SKJAALD.ConsumeWarningZeroAttribute: {name} has run out of its designated attribute resource pool!
SKJAALD.ConsumableLastChargeWarn: This is the last charge of this unit and consuming it will also reduce the item's quantity by 1
SKJAALD.CurrencyConvertHint: Convert all carried currency to the highest possible denomination to reduce the amount of coinage carried by the character. Be wary, this action cannot be undone.
SKJAALD.DeathSaveCriticalSuccess: {name} critically succeeded on a death saving throw and has regained 1 Hit Point!
SKJAALD.DeathSaveSuccess: {name} has survived with 3 death save successes and is now stable!
SKJAALD.DeathSaveFailure: {name} has died with 3 death save failures!
SKJAALD.DeathSaveUnnecessary: You do not need to roll death saves because you have a positive number of hit points or have already reached 3 successes or failures.
SKJAALD.EffectUnavailableInfo: Source item must be equipped or attuned to activate these
SKJAALD.FilterNoSpells: No spells found for this set of filters.
SKJAALD.NoSpellLevels: This character has no spellcaster levels, but you may add spells manually.
SKJAALD.FlagsInstructions: Configure character features and traits which fine-tune behaviors of the SKJAALD system.
SKJAALD.FlagsDiamondSoulHint: Gain proficiency to all saving throws.
SKJAALD.FlagsElvenAccuracyHint: Roll an extra d20 with advantage to Dex, Int, Wis, or Cha.
SKJAALD.FlagsHalflingLuckyHint: Reroll ones when rolling d20 checks.
SKJAALD.FlagsInitiativeAdvHint: Provided by feats or magical items.
SKJAALD.FlagsJOATHint: Half-Proficiency to Ability Checks in which you are not already Proficient.
SKJAALD.FlagsObservantHint: Provides a +5 to passive Perception and Investigation.
SKJAALD.FlagsRemarkableAthleteHint: Half-Proficiency (rounded-up) to physical Ability Checks and Initiative.
SKJAALD.FlagsWeaponCritThresholdHint: An expanded critical hit threshold for weapon attacks.
SKJAALD.FlagsSpellCritThresholdHint: An expanded critical hit threshold for spell attacks.
SKJAALD.FlagsMeleeCriticalDiceHint: A number of additional damage dice added to melee weapon critical hits.
SKJAALD.HitDiceConfigHint: Adjust remaining hit dice levels for each class.
SKJAALD.HitDiceWarn: {name} has no available {formula} Hit Dice remaining!
SKJAALD.LongRestHint: Take a long rest? On a long rest you will recover hit points, half your maximum hit dice, class resources, limited use item charges, and spell slots.
SKJAALD.LongRestResult: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {health} Hit Points and {dice} Hit Dice.
SKJAALD.LongRestResultHitDice: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {dice} Hit Dice.
SKJAALD.LongRestResultHitPoints: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {health} Hit Points.
SKJAALD.Name: Character Name
SKJAALD.PolymorphKeepClass: Keep proficiency bonus (leaves class items in sheet)
SKJAALD.PolymorphKeepMental: Keep mental ability scores (Int, Wis, Cha)
SKJAALD.PolymorphKeepPhysical: Keep physical ability scores (Str, Dex, Con)
SKJAALD.PolymorphMergeSaves: Merge saving throw proficiencies (take the highest)
SKJAALD.PolymorphRevertWarn: You do not have permission to revert this Actor's polymorphed state.
SKJAALD.PolymorphWarn: You are not allowed to polymorph this actor!
SKJAALD.MovementConfigHint: Configure the movement speed and special movement attributes of this creature.
SKJAALD.NewDayHint: Recover limited use abilities which recharge "per day"?
SKJAALD.SensesConfigHint: Configure any special sensory perception abilities that this actor possesses.
SKJAALD.ShortRestHint: Take a short rest? On a short rest you may spend remaining Hit Dice and recover primary or secondary resources.
SKJAALD.ShortRestResult: {name} takes a short rest spending {dice} Hit Dice to recover {health} Hit Points.
SKJAALD.SpellCastNoSlots: You have no available {level} spell slots with which to cast {name}
SKJAALD.Title: Title
SKJAALD.WarnBadACFormula: The provided AC formula could not be evaluated.
SKJAALD.WarnMultipleArmor: More than one suit of armor equipped, AC calculation may be incorrect.
SKJAALD.WarnMultipleShields: More than one shield equipped, AC calculation may be incorrect.
SKJAALD.description: A system for playing the fifth edition of the worlds most popular roleplaying game in the Foundry Virtual Tabletop environment.
SKJAALD.Head: Head
SKJAALD.NoRationsLeft: You dump out your pack only to find you have nothing to eat. Maybe you can find some crumbs on the bottom somewhere....
SKJAALD.NoWaterLeft: Why do you need SO. MUCH. WATER??? Now you're outta luck cuz it's all dry in here
SKJAALD.NoRationItem: Someone forgot to pack a lunch.... (There's not even empty wrappers in here!)
SKJAALD.NoWaterItem: Where did you leave your waterskin, cuz it definitely ain't here...
SETTINGS.5eAllowPolymorphingL: Allow players to polymorph their own actors.
SETTINGS.5eAutoCollapseCardL: Automatically collapse Item Card descriptions in the Chat Log
SETTINGS.5eAutoSpellTemplateL: When a spell is cast, defaults to begin the process to create the corresponding Measured Template if any (requires TRUSTED or higher player role)
SETTINGS.5eCurWtL: Carried currency affects character encumbrance following the rules on PHB pg. 143.
SETTINGS.5eDiagL: Configure which diagonal movement rule should be used for games within this system.
SETTINGS.5eInitTBL: Append the raw Dexterity ability score to break ties in Initiative.
SETTINGS.5eNoExpL: Remove experience bars from character sheets.
SETTINGS.5eRestL: Configure which rest variant should be used for games within this system.
SETTINGS.5eMetricL: Replaces all reference to lbs with kgs and updates the encumberance calculations to use metric weight units.
